samples.question: Tell me, what kind of music do you enjoy listening to?
samples.transcript: Oh, I am a big fan of rap and pop music. My favorite singer is Stutlin. She is a very talented Vietnamese singer. I can vividly remember I repeated her first album, Ai, over and over in 2024 because I found it very relatable to me. Wonderful. Well done.
samples.transcript_original: Oh, I'm a big fan of rap and pop music. My favorite singer is Stutlin. She is a very talented Vietnamese singer. I can vividly remember I repeated her first album, Ai, over and over in 2024 because I found it very relatable to me. Wonderful. Well done.

samples.question: Has your taste in music changed over time?
samples.transcript: I think yes, definitely. Because when I was younger, I enjoyed traditional and music for children more. But as I grew up, my type switched to rap and pop as I mentioned before. Because I think I understand the lyrics behind the song more, therefore I find them relatable to me.

But as I grew up, um, my type switched to rap and pop as I mentioned before. Because I think I understand the lyrics behind the song more, therefore I find them relatable to me.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I think yes, definitely. Because when I was younger, I enjoyed traditional and music for children more. But as I grew up, my type switched to rap and pop as I mentioned before. Because I think I understand the lyrics behind the song more, therefore I find them relatable to me.

samples.question: Do you prefer listening to live music or recorded music?
samples.transcript: It is hard to choose but I would go with recorded music because I am a type of person who loves enjoying music in a quiet and private room. And also recorded music is available on many apps such as Spotify and Apple Music so you can listen to it everywhere anytime. But sometimes I do enjoy going to concerts for live music because the heat there always brings up my mood and if you are fortunate enough you can listen to unreleased songs from singers. Thank you, wonderful.

samples.question: Do you prefer eating at home or in restaurants?
samples.transcript: Oh, I prefer eating at home because I want to cook for my family. I am confident about my wonderful skills of cooking which I learned from my stunning mom. I am passionate about cooking for my stunning family, the people I love most in the world. Wonderful, well done.

samples.question: And the final question, has your diet changed compared to when you were younger?
samples.transcript: I think it has changed a lot. When I was a kid, I did not say that I hated vegetables, but I did not like it because I think that only herbivores animals eat plants. But now when I understand the importance of vegetables in your diet, I started to eat more salad and vegetables. Thank you, well done. That brings us to the end of part one now.

samples.question: So Langan, the question is could you please describe a time when you learned a new skill?
samples.transcript: Okay Langan, that brings us to the end of the minute.
samples.transcript_original: Okay Langan, that brings us to the end of the minute.

samples.question: However, if I had to pick one, it would be how to ride a motorbike.
samples.transcript: I first learned it three years ago when I switched from secondary school to high school. And my father, my father spent three months just to teach me how to ride basically. It was really difficult at that time. My parents did not have much time to take me from school to home and to my extra classes. So they decided to bought me a motorbike so I can ride by myself. At first learning, I felt very nervous and I was shaking all the time. I fell a lot too. I can vividly remember one time when I was riding by my own on the street. I crashed into another motorbike and we both fell on the street but thankfully no one was injured because we both wear helmets. I was shaking. I did not know what to do, so I cried a lot. My father came to take me home. And I did not ride a motorbike for at least three months since then. But now I feel very confident about my motorbike skills I haven been stopped by a police any time And I over the moon because I can ride to school or hang out with my friend any time anywhere I like without the assistance of my parents That makes me think over the moon. Thank you. Fantastic. Thank you, Lange An. Well done. Hang on. So.

samples.question: Tell me, do you think it is easier for a child or an adult to learn a new skill?
samples.transcript: Definitely children, which is important for their brain development because children's brain have functions much better than an adult and they have great adaptability. For example, you can see that a child remembers a poem or learns a new song or even learns a new language better than an adult. Wonderful, well done.

samples.question: I want to ask, how important are teachers in the process of learning?
samples.transcript: I would say the teacher plays an important role in learning, not only because they act as a guidance and a mentor to the child learning process, but also they provide emotional care and support for children. For example, many teachers have, ease the problem about how, children would feel at school and, their issue. therefore I think that an AI robot could never replace a teacher. Thank you. Well done.

samples.question: What skills do you think will be most useful in the future?

samples.question: So how often do you get a haircut?
samples.transcript: I get a haircut once a month. And, usually I went to a barber shop to take my haircut.
